short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle video playback with a global hotkey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds the option to use a global hotkey to pause/unpause videos from anywhere, regardless if you are tabbed in or not.

Feature to select the active video tab.

Designed for Youtube, may work for other video websites.
